Paragraph: The size of the alkyl side chain is known to affect the processability and interchain interactions of a polymer , which would provide a tool to optimize the π-π stacking interactions of a polymer in the solid state.

Note: "size of the alkyl side chain" and "processability of a polymer" are material properties, while "interactions" is a type of property that refers to the behavior of materials in relation to each other. "π-π stacking interactions of a polymer in the solid state" is a specific type of intermolecular interaction between aromatic groups in polymers in the solid state.
